sdata.j: われわれは、|↑熱帯|↑↓ねったい↓↑雨林↑↓うりん↓↑無↑↓な↓しではやっていけない。

sdata.e: I've done rock climbing and deep-sea diving and slept in an Indonesian jungle.

sdata.e: The world's tropical rainforests are critical links in the ecological chain of life on the planet.

sdata.e: They live on the snow and ice of the Poles and in tropical jungles.

sdata.e: The sun and a damp climate made the tropical rainforest.
